prompt_text: When the Office WLED is turned on, wait 2 seconds, then turn on all living room lights to 70%, wait another 3 seconds, and set the Office WLED to 100% brightness
automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_sequence_1'
alias: Office WLED triggers Living Room sequence
description: "When Office WLED turns on, sequence Living Room and Office brightness changes"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.wled
    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'
conditions: []
action:
  - delay: '00:00:02'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness: 179
  - delay: '00:00:03'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 255

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, living, office
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten
